com.st.st25sdk.command

Class NdefVicinityCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.command.Iso15693Protocol
      • com.st.st25sdk.command.VicinityCommand
        • com.st.st25sdk.command.NdefVicinityCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VicinityCommandInterface

    public class NdefVicinityCommand
extends VicinityCommand
    Defines methods to build commands to work with NFC Forum Type5 NDEF messages adapted to Vicinity tags

    • Constructor Detail

      • NdefVicinityCommand

        public NdefVicinityCommand(RFReaderInterface reader,
                           byte[] uid)
        Constructor for a NdefVicinityCommand object
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader interface object to be used to send the commands
        uid - Tag's UID (used only if the Addressed mode bit is set in the request flag)

      • NdefVicinityCommand

        public NdefVicinityCommand(RFReaderInterface reader,
                           byte[] uid,
                           byte flag)
        Constructor for a NdefVicinityCommand object
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader interface object to be used to send the commands
        uid - Tag's UID (used only if the Addressed mode bit is set in the request flag)
        flag - Request flag for the command. The protocol extension flag should be set to 1

      • NdefVicinityCommand

        public NdefVicinityCommand(RFReaderInterface reader,
                           byte[] uid,
                           int nbrOfBytesPerBlock)
        Constructor for a NdefVicinityCommand object
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader interface object to be used to send the commands
        uid - Tag's UID (used only if the Addressed mode bit is set in the request flag)
        nbrOfBytesPerBlock - number of bytes per block

      • NdefVicinityCommand

        public NdefVicinityCommand(RFReaderInterface reader,
                           byte[] uid,
                           byte flag,
                           int nbrOfBytesPerBlock)
        Constructor for a NdefVicinityCommand object
        Parameters:
        reader - the reader interface object to be used to send the commands
        uid - Tag's UID (used only if the Addressed mode bit is set in the request flag)
        flag - Request flag for the command. The protocol extension flag should be set to 1
        nbrOfBytesPerBlock - number of bytes per block

    • Method Detail

      • writeNdefMessage

        public void writeNdefMessage(int blockOffset,
                             NDEFMsg msg,
                             byte flag,
                             byte[] uid)
                      throws STException
        Write a NDEF message starting at a specified offset
        Parameters:
        blockOffset - offset in block where to write NDEF message
        msg - NDEF Message to write, must not be null
        flag - Request flag for the command
        uid - Tag's UID (used only if the Addressed mode bit is set in the request flag)
        Throws:
        STException

      • readNdefMessage

        public NDEFMsg readNdefMessage(int offsetInBlocks,
                               byte flag,
                               byte[] uid)
                        throws STException
        Read the NdefMessage starting at a specified block offset
        Parameters:
        offsetInBlocks - offset in block where to read N blocks
        flag - Request flag for the command
        uid - Tag's UID (used only if the Addressed mode bit is set in the request flag)
        Returns:
        NDEF Message read
        Throws:
        STException
